cards.title: Chazz Princeton
powers: You may play a card from your hand that shares a Keyword, other than 'limited', with a target you have in your play area. If you do not, draw 1 card.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may play a card.
One hero may use a power.
One player may draw a card.

cards.title: Armed Dragon Lv3
body: At the start of your next turn after this card was played, you may play 'Armed Dragon Lv5' from your hand. If you do, destroy this card.
If this card is destroyed, draw 1 card.

cards.title: Armed Dragon Lv5
body: When you play this card during your play or power phase, destroy a target you control.
At the start of your next turn after this card was played, you may play 'Armed Dragon Lv7' from your hand. If you do, destroy this card.
At the end of your turn, deal 1 target 2 projectile damage.

cards.title: Armed Dragon Lv7
body: Cannot be played during your play or power phase.
At the start of your next turn after this card was played, you may play 'Armed Dragon Lv10' from your hand. If you do, destroy this card.
At the end of your turn, deal 1 target 3 projectile damage.

cards.title: Armed Dragon Lv10
body: Cannot be played except at the start of your turn.
At the end of your turn, deal 1 target 4 Projectile damage.
powers: Discard a card. Deal each non-hero target 4 projectile damage.

cards.title: V-Tiger Jet
cards.body: At the end of your turn, deal 1 target 1 radiant damage.
powers: If 'W-Wing Catapult' is in your play area, you may destroy an Ongoing Card.

cards.title: W-Wing Catapult
cards.body: At the end of your turn, deal 1 target 1 radiant damage.
powers: If 'V-Tiger Jet' is in your play area, you may destroy an Environment Card.

cards.title: X-Head Cannon
cards.body: At the end of your turn, deal 1 target 1 radiant damage.
powers: If 'Y-Dragon Head' is in your play area, select a target. Until the start of your turn, damage dealt to that target is irreducible. If 'Z-Metal Tank' is in your play area, you may use a power now.

cards.title: Y-Dragon Head
cards.body: At the end of your turn, deal 1 target 1 radiant damage.
powers: If 'Z-Metal Tank' is in your play area, each ABC target gains 1 HP. If 'X-Head Cannon' is in your play area, you may use a power now.

cards.title: Z-Metal Tank
cards.body: At the end of your turn, deal 1 target 1 radiant damage.
powers: If 'X-Head Cannon' is in your play area, select a target. Until the start of your turn, damage dealt by that target is reduced by 1. If 'Y-Dragon Head' is in your play area, you may use a power now.

cards.title: ABC Union
body: When this card is played, for each 'abc' target in your play area, you may either destroy an Ongoing or Environment card, or select a hero to draw a card.
Increase damage dealt by 'abc' targets by 1.
Reduce damage dealt to 'abc' targets by 1.
At the start of your tun, destroy this card.

cards.title: Ojama Yellow
body: The first time each turn that this card would be dealt damage, you may redirect that damage to another Hero Target.
After this has occurred, for the rest of the turn this card may redirect any damage that would be dealt to another Hero Target to itself.

cards.title: Ojama Green
body: The first time each turn that this card would be dealt damage, you may redirect that damage to another Hero Target.
After this has occurred, for the rest of the turn this card may redirect any damage that would be dealt to another Hero Target to itself.

cards.title: Ojama Black
body: The first time each turn that this card would be dealt damage, you may redirect that damage to another Hero Target.
After this has occurred, for the rest of the turn this card may redirect any damage that would be dealt to another Hero Target to itself.

cards.title: Ojama King
body: When this card enters play, you can select up to X other non-character cards in play or in trash, and shuffle them into their respective decks, where X is the number of other 'ojama' targets in your play area.
Increase damage dealt by this card by the number of cards shuffled into deck this way.
Reduce damage dealt to this card by the number of cards shuffled into deck this way.
The first time each turn this card is dealt damage, this card deals the source of that damage 2 melee damage.

cards.title: Ojamuscle
cards.body: Select one 'ojama' target in your play area. For each 'ojama' target in your play area, the selected target deals 1 target 1 melee damage.

cards.title: Magical Mallet
body: Shuffle any number of cards from your hand into your deck.
Draw cards equal to the number of cards you shuffled into your deck, +1.
You may play a card.

cards.title: You Go Bye Bye!
cards.body: The first time each turn that you play a target that shares a Keyword with another target in your play area, other that 'limited', Chazz Princeton gains 2 HP and deals 1 target 2 sonic damage.

cards.title: Call Of The Haunted
cards.body: At the start of your turn, you may select a target in your trash that has 5HP or less and put it in play.

cards.title: The Princeton Name
cards.body: Draw 4 cards. Discard up to 3 cards. Chazz Princeton deals himself X psychic damage where X is 3 minus the number of cards discarded this way.

cards.title: It's Go Time!'
body: If you have any 'armed' targets, any 'abc' targets, and/or any 'ojama' targets in your play area, you may search your deck for 1 'armed' card, 1 'abc' card, and/or 1 'ojama' card, respectively, and put them in your hand.
Shuffle your deck.
